arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Great news for Paris!
arts.sum: This Wednesday, Paris Saint-Germain will be at the Stade du Moustoir to face Lorient (kickoff at 7 p.m., CET) as part of the 10th matchday of Ligue 1 2025-2026. On the eve of this match, the club broadcast the first 15 minutes of training at the PSG Campus. We saw that Fabian Ruiz (29-year-old midfielder) […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Luis Enrique’s press conference live this Tuesday
arts.sum: This Wednesday at 7 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir on the 10th matchday of Ligue 1 2025-2026. On the eve of this match, Paris coach Luis Enrique will hold a press conference at 1 p.m. You can follow the event live here (we will then publish […]

arts.ttl: Lorient vs PSG – Follow Paris Saint-Germain’s training session this Tuesday
arts.sum: This Tuesday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will be training at the PSG Campus at 11 a.m. to prepare for Wednesday evening’s match against Lorient (16th) at the Stade du Moustoir on the 10th day of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 7 p.m., CET). The club is offering live coverage of the session:

Lorient sit in 16th place in Ligue 1 ahead of this fixture, having failed to win in their previous three games. Their last win came back in September, beating Monaco 3-1. PSG are top of the table aft...
